Four clans fight to protect - or enforce - their own way of life. Who will win the throne of Armello?
The world of Armello is a world right out of fairty tales - the kind of world parents tell their children about in bedtime stories to fuel imaginations of adventure and mysticism. Or at least, it used to be. Back then, the four clans lived in harmony, and society was held together by the Wyld - a magical energy that permeated all things, harnessed to create all sorts of wondrous technologies and spells.

All of that was before the dawn of the Rot. A horrible disease that infects the very earth, opening up giant black sores in the land and causing nature to wither away into ash. It once intrigued warlocks, as many felt they could harness its incredible power - but that power comes at the cost of complete madness in anyone infected with the disease. By the time it had spread through the land, it was already too late to stop it. In fact, it had already infected the noble King, turning him into a mad tyrant...

As resources wither away and the Rot closes in, the four once peaceful clans now feud with each other, each looking to protect their own lands and ways of life no matter the cost. Amidst all this, you're lingering somewhere in this wide kingdom.. but where?

Brave and noble warriors from the frigid mountains of the far north...
Far north of the Palace, a long stoic mountain range known as the Northern Needles looms, forming some of the coldest parts of Armello year-round. Only those with the hardiest of constitutions could survive up there... making this place the perfect home for the capital of the Wolf Clan. The hierarchy of the wolves may seem esoteric to outsiders, but it's all based on strict systems of dominance, power, and honor. Outsiders should be fine, as long as they recognize the authority of the "Alphas", and don't go sticking their noses into the territory of unfamiliar packs.

A chilly place to start your adventure. So, just who are you?

Patience.

Sure, River’s knack for enduring the wilderness alone indefinitely certainly contributed to her ongoing survival… but it was her patience that allowed her to get the job done. The patience to rage wars of attrition that can last for years, and the patience to wait, near motionless, for the perfect time to eliminate a target.

It was this patience that’s allowed her to lie on a ridge above the village of Caershire, nearly motionless, for almost a week now. A group of bandits nearby have proven… particularly bothersome for her, and they’ve seemingly been plundering villages in this valley one by one. In her eyes, it’ll only be a matter of time before they come for Caershire… and when they do, she’ll be ready.

Over the horizon, a band of silhouettes was descending slowly down a hill towards the village, and it wasn’t hard to tell just who, exactly, they were. She grimaced, sliding an arrow onto the string of her bow as she watched them approach.

Bandits and outlaws… thieves and conmen. All animals that have been ousted from the other clans, and have thus made their living on the road, their only allegiance being to their own self-interest. info.brief_description: Pack on the pounds as you explore the world of Armello, but try not to get eaten yourself!
info.description:
[Embed For Use By Upgraded+]

Armello is a competitive multiplayer game themed after a board game, created by the League of Geeks, where each player plays an anthropomorphic warrior vying for control over the fantasy kingdom of Armello. This interactive is a bit of a re-imagining, where many of the warriors will likely up end getting more plump than fit over the course of their adventures! Be it through eating a ton of tasty snacks, to swallowing their fallen opponents, expect your favorite Armello heroes to be packing on the pounds.

How the World Works: Armello is a kingdom where the various clans - Wolves, Rabbits, Rats and Bears - lived in harmony, under the pure, magical force known as the Wyld. However, this once idyllic world has been tainted by the Rot - a horrible disease that gives its victims incredible power, at the cost of driving them into madness. Even the King of Armello has succumbed to this disease, driven to tyranny and madness by the Rot's dark power...

How the Adventure Works: Champions vow to slowly build their strengths by performing quests, which test their fighting ability, wit, body, or spirit. Once they feel ready, they can face the King himself. Victory against the King, through seduction, combat, magic or rot, will result in that champion being crowned ruler of Armello. Failure at any point before this will result in some sort of Bad End.

How Items and Abilities Work: Champions will not be given various random items or abilities at the beginning of each day; instead, they will new items or learn new abilities organically through their adventures, at the author's discretion. Like in the game, these fit into a few different categories: Items, Spells, Trickery, and Followers.

I reserve the right to edit or delete chapters in this story as I see fit.
